channel.title: JaGex really isn't faun of mitb
channel.description:
I was just recently kicked from Mod Mark's clanchat channel on runescape for mentioning moparisthebest
They really don't like mitb..
I'm afraid of a ban now..

[/quote]Moparisthebest, is still a runescape cheating site…
[/quote]No, you can talk about it there. But not have anything to do with the development of one, for that you come here.[/quote]
